thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com
thread.title: David.
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von David.

author: David.
title: David.
text: I have used MSS for the last two years to transfer my family from Munich airport to Mayrhofen and Saalbach. Both transfers have been faultless with knowledgeable, courteous and professional drivers. Travelling in half term usually entails traffic jams but the local knowledge of MSS meant we avoided any potential delays. The Mercedes vans are new and very comfortable. I wouldn't use anyone else.
